docs.title: Repos in elixir-europe-training
docs.text:
Is your repository missing?

Only repositories with a release are shown here. If you have a repository that you would like to include, create a release and it will be automatically added to this list. Updates are every Sunday.

ELIXIR-SCO-spatial-omics

v1.0.0 45

ELIXIR-TrP-FAIR-training-handbook

v1.1.0 5

2025-10-Ghent 3
